Electric_Fence.help: You surround a single target in an electrical fence, immobilizing them. The target suffers energy damage over time, loses endurance and endures a lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Electric_Fence.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DoT (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Electric_Fence.targetHelp: You are immobilized and suffer energy damage over time. Additionally, you are losing endurance and suffer recovery.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Tesla_Cage.help: You confine your target in an electrical prison, holding them in place. The target suffers energy damage, endurance loss and lowered recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Tesla_Cage.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), Hold (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Tesla_Cage.targetHelp: You are held and unable to move. Additionally, you are losing endurance and your recovery rate has been reduced.

Chain_Fences.help: You immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor energy damage and draining the endurance of affected foes. These foes also suffer from reduced recovery rates.
Chain_Fences.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG (Energy), Immobilize (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), -Fly (Foe)
Chain_Fences.targetHelp: You are immobilized. Additionally, you are losing endurance and suffer a lowered recovery rate.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
You lose {Damage} points of endurance due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.

Jolting_Chain.help: You send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing muscle spasms and dealing minor damage. Each affected foe is knocked down, and suffers both endurance loss and lowered recovery. This bolt can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly.
Jolting_Chain.shortHelp: Ranged (Chain AoE), Minor DMG(Energy), Knockdown (Foe), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe)
Jolting_Chain.targetHelp: You are suffering endurance loss and lowered recovery rate.

Charged_Bolts.help: You quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing energy damage and draining some endurance. These bolts may also lower the target's recovery rate. Some of this endurance may transfer back to you.
Charged_Bolts.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Charged_Bolts.targetHelp: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
You lose {Damage} points of endurance due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Charged_Brawl.help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
Charged_Brawl.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Charged_Brawl.targetHelp: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Havok_Punch.help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch to a single target. This causes energy damage and drains endurance. There is a chance that the target will suffer reduced recovery rate and be knocked back. Additionally, some of the drained endurance may return to you.
Havok_Punch.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), EndDrain (Foe), Chance for -Rec (Foe), Knockdown (Foe), EndGain (Self)
Havok_Punch.targetHelp: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.

Thunder_Strike.help: You discharge a cone of static electricity that deals energy damage and drains endurance from all affected foes. Additionally, affected foes suffer a reduced recovery rate. Some of the drained endurance may be returned to you.
Thunder_Strike.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Energy), EndDrain (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for EndGain (Self)
Thunder_Strike.targetHelp: You are losing endurance and suffer a reduced recovery rate.
